title: Spam showing up in in box
content: why does marked as junk spam continue to show up in my in box

title: lost folders and files
content: I returned from holiday to find a new version of Thunderbird running on my PC. All the old email folders going back to 2017 and all my emails prior to 14 Aug. 2024 were gone! I don't have a back up of my hard drive. Is there any way to retrieve the folders and emails? Cheers Chris
creator: christopher.wood11

title: Cannot reveive nor send email
content: For the past two days (Aug 20,2024) I have received NO emails and CANNOT send. I get the message, "because the connection to Outgoing server (SMTP) smtp.gmail.com timed out." I have tried reloading Thunderbird with no results. The email zfhanna@gmail is also on my phone. My Tbird is on an IMac and Windows 10 laptop. Neither works. For Wifi I use a satellite provider.
creator: zfhanna

title: How to archive a Local folder and subfolders?
content: I have moved from Mailbird to Thunderbird, a pat on my back I am really satisfied. I use POP3 so all my emails are downloaded to my computer. I keep two years of incoming and sent emails in Local Folders as follows: email account 1 year 2023 > Folders and subfolders organized per topic year 2022 > Folders and subfolders organized per topic The same for three other accounts. These occupy a lot of disk space, so I want to archive each email account with its folders and subfolders and move them to an external drive. Is this possible with Thunderbird? Please help enodio enobri17@gmail.com
creator: enodio

title: Sincronizzazione server/Thunderbird
content: Salve, ho installato Thunderbird 128.1.1esr (64 bit). Ho impostato l'account di posta elettronica con IMAP e scaricato tutti i messaggi presenti nel server. Ho impostato la sincronizzazione in modo da lasciare una copia dei messaggi sul server quando li scarico su Thinderbird. Ora per√≤, ho bisogno che la sincronizzazione mi consenta di lasciare i messaggi su Thunderbird quando li cancello dal server (ci sono molti messaggi vecchi che voglio conservare nel mio hard disc, ma che mi occupano troppo spazio nel server), mentre, invece va bene che vengano cancellati anche nel server se li cancello da Thunderbird. Come posso fare?
creator: leogioffre
